title: Heroku Moved Twelve-Factor Apps to Open Source. What’s Next?
author: Heather Joslyn
description: Why did Heroku move the project, a methodology for building portable, resilient applications? To get help updating it, said Gail Frederick of Salesforce, in this episode of The New Stack Makers.
cntitle: Heroku 将十二要素应用迁移到开源。下一步是什么？
cndescription: Salesforce 的 Gail Frederick 在《The New Stack Makers》的这一集中表示，Heroku 迁移该项目的原因是为了获得更新帮助，该项目是一种构建可移植、弹性应用程序的方法。
